discussion.p: The atomic_exchange and atomic_exchange_explicit functions seem to be inconsistently missing parameters.

blockquote.p: Lawrence: Need to write up a list for Pete with details.
Detlef: Should not be New, we already talked about in Concurrency group.
Lawrence will handle all issues relating to atomics in a single paper.
LWG will defer discussion on atomics until that paper appears.

resolution.p: Add the appropriate parameters. For example,

blockquote.pre: bool atomic_exchange(volatile atomic_bool*, bool); bool atomic_exchange_explicit(volatile atomic_bool*, bool, memory_order);
